europeana:record.dc:title: Herpetozoa 10_3_4 (1997)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Adamopoulou Chloe, Al-Melhim Walid N., Amr Zuhair S., Böhme Wolfgang, Broggi Mario F., Capula Massimo, Disi Ahmad M., Kárpáti Lászlo, Legakis Anastasios, Luiselli Luca M., Malkmus Rudolf, Martens Harald, Moravec Jirí, Nieto Roman Sandra, Palanca Soler Antonio, Rodriguez Vieites David, Rugiero Lorenzo, Sauer Horst, Tunner Heinz, Valakos Efstratios, Vences Miguel
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Harald Martens: A review of "Zoogeography of amphibians and reptiles of Syria, with additional new records" (Herpetozoa 9 (1/2), 1996). 99- 106. Massimo Capula, Luca M. Luiselli: A tentative review of sexual behavior and alternative reproductive strategies of the Italian colubrid snakes (Squamata: Serpentes: Colubridae). 107- 119. Jirí Moravec, Wolfgang Böhme: A new subspecies of the Mediterranean Gecko, Hemidactylus turcicus from the Syrian lava desert (Squamata: Sauria: Gekkonidae). 121- 128. Miguel Vences, Antonio Palanca Soler, David Rodriguez Vieites, Sandra Nieto Roman: Designation and description of a lectotype of Rana aragonensis Palanca Soler & al., 1995 (Anura: Ranidae). 129- 134. Mario F. Broggi: Notizen zur Herpetofauna von Kalymnos und Leros (Dodekanes, Griechenland). 135- 138. Heinz Tunner, Lászlo Kárpáti: The Water Frogs (Rana esculenta complex) of the Neusiedlersee region (Austria, Hungary) (Anura: Ranidae). 139- 148. Lorenzo Rugiero: Tail loss and escape behavior in the Common Wall Lizard Podarcis muralis Laurenti, 1768. A preliminary analysis (Squamata: Sauria: Lacertidae). 149- 152. Mario F. Broggi: Zur Verbreitung von Testudo graeca ibera Pallas, 1814 auf den Inseln der Nordostägäis und der Dodekanes (Griechenland) (Testudines: Testudinidae). 153- 155. Rudolf Malkmus, Horst Sauer: Bemerkungen zur Verbreitung von Macroprotodon cucullatus ibericus Busack & McCoy, 1990 in Portugal nördlich des Rio Tejo (Squamata: Serpentes: Colubridae). 157- 161. Zuhair S. Amr, Ahmad M. Disi, Walid N. Al-Melhim: Additions to the knowledge of Müller's Snake, Micrelaps muelleri Boettger, 1880 (Squamata: Serpentes: Colubridae). 163- 168. Rudolf Malkmus: Neue Daten zur Höhenverbreitung des Mittelmeerlaubfrosches, Hyla meridionalis Boettger, 1874, in Portugal (Anura: Hyllidae). 169- 171. Chloe Adamopoulou, Efstratios Valakos, Anastasios Legakis: Notes on the diet and reproduction of the Cyclades Blunt-nosed Viper, Macrovipera schweizeri (Werner, 1935) (Squamata: Serpentes: Viperidae). 173- 175
